name: probot-codeowners-labeller
description: Labels Elastic teams in Pull Requests based on contents of the CODEOWNERS file.

PRIVATE_KEY.description: the private key you downloaded when creating the GitHub Integration

APP_ID.description: the ID of your GitHub Integration

WEBHOOK_PROXY_URL.description: the URL of the proxy used by your Github Integration

WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: the secret configured for your GitHub Integration
